title: Kuroshitsuji Season 2 OVA
alternative_title: Black Butler II Specials, 黒執事II: シエル・イン・ワンダーランド
description: One of the noble families of England – Phantomhive, has a butler, Sebastian Michaels. He has unquestionably perfect knowledge, manners, talent with materials. martial arts and much more. But for some reason, he serves a 12 year old master…
